alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Northwest Beaverhead County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 20 at 12:42PM MST until December 22 at 6:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON WEDNESDAY TO 6 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 60 below zero. * WHERE...Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains and Northwest Beaverhead County. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 5 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Wednesday. For the Wind Chill Warning, from Noon Wednesday to 6 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Exposed skin may become quickly frostbitten or frozen. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills will be coldest Wednesday night through early Thursday afternoon.

area.areaDesc: Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Northwest Beaverhead County
